import { Popover, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { ChevronDownIcon } from '@heroicons/react/solid' import { Fragment } from 'react' const solutions = [ { name: 'Insights', description: 'Measure actions your users take', href: '##', icon: IconOne, }, { name: 'Automations', description: 'Create your own targeted content', href: '##', icon: IconTwo, }, { name: 'Reports', description: 'Keep track of your growth', href: '##', icon: IconThree, }, ] const _Popover = () => { return (
{({ open }) => ( <> Solutions
{solutions.map((item) => (

{item.name}

{item.description}

))}
Documentation Start integrating products and tools
)}
) } function IconOne() { return ( ) } function IconTwo() { return ( ) } function IconThree() { return ( ) } export default _Popover
